definitions.title: (Qal
definitions.body: perhaps be distasteful, cf. Syr, me0n taeduit, piguit, Aph. be slothful; NH Pi., as term, techn. of girl, refuse to acknowledge marriage contract; poss. akin to Eth. mann: reject; Ar. ma0’ana is sustain, maintain);—
